response.overview: The first film from Drunken Yinzers Releasing! A long lost shot on video film from Luther Ickes, owner of Pittsburgh's greatest bar, The Brillo Box, explores the legend of Bigfoot mixed with the legendary Pittsburgh music scene. A seven year labor of love, shot on an ipad and shelved for years. Till now! A perfect find for the Drunken Yinzers movie family. It's got Pittsburgh morons, Bigfoot cults, and of course Sasquatch himself! A bunch of 'em!!!! Does he exist? Did they have too many Iron Shittys? Who knows? But it's gonna be a helluva ride trying to solve the mystery of Pittsburgh Bigfoot!
response.tagline: Fuck Boggy Creek, he's gonna terrorize turtle crick!
response.title: In Search Of: Pittsburgh Bigfoot
